20110107010006.000|20110107010007.000|CC1|WERE SHOT, TWO OF THEM KILLED.  
20110107010007.000|20110107010008.000|CC1|ALL THROUGHOUT THE AFTERNOON    
20110107010008.000|20110107010009.000|CC1|PEOPLE HERE IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD 
20110107010009.000|20110107010011.000|CC1|HAVE STOPPED BY TO PLACE FLOWERS
20110107010011.000|20110107010013.000|CC1|AND CANDLES, WHERE ONE OF THE   
20110107010013.000|20110107010015.000|CC1|VICTIMS DIED ON THE SIDEWALK

20110107010019.000|20110107010022.000|CC1|ARE DEALING WITH, BUT LATE THIS

20110107010023.000|20110107010025.000|CC1|TOGETHER A SKETCH OF THE MAN    
20110107010025.000|20110107010028.000|CC1|THEY BELIEVE PULLED THE TRIGGER.

20110107010030.000|20110107010032.000|CC1|THE SUSPECT MIGHT LOOK LIKE,

20110107010034.000|20110107010034.000|CC1|HIM.

20110107010036.000|20110107010038.000|CC1|FOUR TEENAGERS OUT HERE LAST    
20110107010038.000|20110107010041.000|CC1|NIGHT, KILLING TWO OF THEM.     
20110107010041.000|20110107010045.000|CC1|16-YEAR-OLD ANDREW JACKSON AND
